channel.title: ~~~pimpscape shop help~~~
channel.description:
ok here is what i am requesting........
will someone upload their items.cfg for me..... i have the one that came with pimpscape but i don't like it......... its all messed up......the prices aren't right and the bonuses blk and white give are too high..... so if someone would give me theirs that would be great.....
another thing is i have a question...... why won't my npcs sell anything..... i added the wanne shop thing into client.... added the npc into auto spawn..... added it into shop.cfg then when i log on he says what he is supposed to but when i click on talk to......the store window doesn't show up.... and i also tried this with a npc that has the trade opt but still same thing...... how i fix this?
thx in advance to all who help.......
________________________________________________________________________________________________________ anyone?? someone plz help me out here....... ______________________________________________________--- doesn't anyone know?????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????

item.title: ~~~pimpscape shop help~~~
item.dc:creator: @Haxor_X Haxor X
item.description:
@Haxor_X wrote:

ok here is what i am requesting…

will someone upload their items.cfg for me…
i have the one that came with pimpscape but i don’t like it…
its all messed up…the prices aren’t right and the bonuses blk and white give are too high…
so if someone would give me theirs that would be great…

another thing is i have a question…
why won’t my npcs sell anything…
i added the wanne shop thing into client…
added the npc into auto spawn…
added it into shop.cfg
then when i log on he says what he is supposed to but when i click on talk to…the store window doesn’t show up…
and i also tried this with a npc that has the trade opt but still same thing…
how i fix this?

thx in advance to all who help…

anyone??
someone plz help me out here…

doesn’t anyone know???
